Member Function Documentation

bool UQueryParser::evaluate (  )  const

The Disjunctive Normal Form is an ORing of ANDed terms. In other words, if the OR is considered an additive operation and the AND a multiplicative operation, then the DNF is a sum of products

bool UQueryParser::parse ( const UString &  query  ) 

Parses a textual boolean expression and creates a binary syntax tree. Dynamically allocates a tree of nodes that represents the syntactic structure of 'query'. The returned tree must eventually be destroyed with operator delete

Parameters:
query text of the boolean expression to parse
